translation: Having known this, the ancient seekers of freedom also performed action; therefore, do thou also perform action, as the ancients did in days of yore.
commentary: 4.15 And thus? knowing having known? kritam (was) done? Karma action? Purvaih by ancients? Even also? seekers after freedom? Do perform? Karma action? Eve even? Therefore therefore? You thou?
